DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of the efficacy and safety of the Ventricular Pace Suppression (VpS) algorithm.
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to investigate the percentage of reduction of ventricular pacing using the VpS feature of the EVIA/ENTOVIS pacemaker in a controlled clinical investigation.
